long_description: The waterproof and breathable Obermeyer Aurora insulated jacket for girls exudes speed and toughness in its moto-inspired design. Supple drape and slight shaping ensure comfort and cute style. Polyester with HydroBlock(R) X waterproof-breathable coating and DuroGuard Durable Water Repellent; Skier Critical(TM) seam sealing. Ski Contour(TM) articulated sleeves, shaped seams and contoured waist for fit. Water-resistant powder skirt; stretch inner cuffs; emergency hood; fleece-lined collar; interior windguard; adjustable interior hem drawcord. Tricot-lined handwarmer pockets with zips; chest zip pocket; interior goggles pocket; heavy-duty YKK zippers; detachable, scratch-free goggles cloth; accessory ring.
short_description: The waterproof and breathable Obermeyer Aurora insulated jacket for girls exudes speed and toughness in its moto-inspired design. Supple drape and slight shaping ensure comfort and cute style.
